Articles.Content:
I'm a newbie to KSP and I'm really enjoying it.

How often are KSP updates released?  I'm currently running KSP 1.6.0.2395 for Windows x64 along with Making History 1.6.0.  I purchased both from the Kerbal website, not Steam.

Questions:

1)  Do I have the latest KSP release?

2)  If not, where/how do I download the latest release?

3)  How do I find out when there's a new release for me to download?

Thanks a lot!!!

Welcome to the forum, @Weazer67.

1.6.1 is the current version and Squad's plan is to release an update every 3 months.  The announcements sub-forum is where you will see update status news and you can see previews in the daily kerbal sub-forum.

I'm a steam user so I can't help you with info about the KSP website but I'm sure someone will be along soon that can.

I have it from the store. All you do is go to the actual KSP website (where you bought it) at https://www.kerbalspaceprogram.com/ and then click "account" in the upper right. log in if you need to, and then you'll go to a page with a big DOWNLOAD button. Click that, and you'll have choices of the most stable builds of each version. 1.6.1, 1.5.1, 1.4.5, etc. Basically the same versions people who have it on Steam have (I know that because I also have it on Steam )
